LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipLitterSizeCurve: Litter size is determined using a curve with points, each with a value for "litter size" and its "probability" A valid curve requires at least 3 points and must start and end with a point with probability at 0, otherwise the litter size is set to 1
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipLitterSizeCurveInvalidCount: Invalid number of points: 3 or more points are required and start/end points must have probability of 0
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipLitterSizeCurveInvalidStart: Invalid start/end: curve has to start and end with a probability of 0
